channel.title: Allstar-Scape Sourced JAIL
channel.description: Hey... I need a jail for an Allstar-Scape'd source that actually works.. all of the other ones make me disconnect. Can someone just please post a code that WORKS??? Thanks.. I'll credit you in my server :D

item.title: Allstar-Scape Sourced JAIL
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " is jailing "
+ name;
sendMessage("Succesfully jailed " + name);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2528;
c.teleportToY = 3375;
c.teleblock = true;
c.action = 1;
c.sendMessage(“You have been sent to jail by a Staff Member!”);
c.sendMessage(“A Staff Member will get you out when they feel you are ready.”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {   

            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("JailLogs.txt", true)); 
            bw.write(
                    "[---" + name + " was jailed by " + playerName
                    + "---]"); 
            bw.newLine(); 
            bw.flush(); 
        } catch (IOException ioe) { 
            ioe.printStackTrace(); 
        } finally { 
            if (bw != null) {
                try { 
                    bw.close(); 
                } catch (IOException ioe2) { 
                    sendMessage("Error jailing user."); 
                }
            } 
        } 
    }

  else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
        String name = command.substring(7);
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " is unjailing "
                + name;
    sendMessage("Succesfully unjailed " + name);
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
           c.teleportToX = 3087;
           c.teleportToY = 3491;
        c.teleblock = false;
        c.action = 0;
           c.sendMessage("dont get jailed again you silly noob");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

might wana use eclipse if it doesn’t work for you it corrects errors and things you don’t have

Read full topic
